Package com.example.luckydragon.Models

Class NotificationList

java.lang.Object
com.example.luckydragon.Models.Observable
com.example.luckydragon.Models.NotificationList
public class NotificationList extends Observable
An observable that represents a single user's list of notifications that needs to be sent

    • addNotification

      public void addNotification(String title, String body)
      Add a notification to the list and save to db if list is loaded. If the user has not been loaded, cache the notification to be saved to the db later.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the notification
      body - the body of the notification

    • clearNotifications

      public void clearNotifications()
      Clear the notifications and save to db

    • addToBeAddedNotifications

      private void addToBeAddedNotifications()
